sentences.sContent: Mona wrote with a beautiful simplicity of style.
For the sake of simplicity, the tax form is divided into three sections.
sentences.sCn: 为简明起见，税单分成三个部分。

sentences.sContent: James’ solution to this problem was simplicity itself (= very simple ) .
sentences.sCn: 詹姆斯对这个问题的解决办法十分简单。

trans.tranOther: the quality of being simple and not complicated, especially when this is attractive or useful
